import React from "react"; import FormattedDate from "./FormattedDate"; import WeatherIcon from "./WeatherIcon"; import WeatherTemperature from "./WeatherTemperature"; import GeoLocation from "./GeoLocation"; export default function WeatherInfo(props){ return (

{props.data.city} |

{/* {Math.round(props.data.temperature)} */}

Feels like {Math.round(props.data.feelsLike)}°

{Math.round(props.data.tempMax)}° Max |{" "} {Math.round(props.data.tempMin)} ° Overnight Min

{Math.round(props.data.windSpeed)}km/h Wind
{props.data.tempHumidity}% Humidity
{props.data.description}

); }
